page.title: 10Recreation in the Cowtons
page.content: In East Cowton the Sports & Social Committee plays an important role in recreation. It supports new clubs and gives them financial aid if needed. It holds monthly whist drives in the Winter months and organises 2 supper dances per year. The highlight of the year is Village Week held in July. The committee collates all groups in the village and activities for diff- erent ages take place each day. The week ends with the Annual Sports and fancy dress parade. Every 2 months a Folk and music evening is held in East Cowton village hall. Local and Semi - Proffesional acts entertain and are very popular. In North Cowton, leisure is less organised. Occasionally discos and cocerts take place in the village hall, mostly as fund raisers. There is an annual Sports Day with a small fair and fancy dress competition.
